meta.name: keyword
meta.content: wicket, web, j2ee, java, components, easy, wizard

section.name: Welcome to the Wicket Easy Wizard project
section.p: The Wicket Easy Wizard lets you build wizards fast and easy.
The Wicket Contrib Easy Wizard is part of the Wicket Stuffproject. This Wicket powered project provides non-core components to the Wicket project.

section.name: Latest News

subsection.name: March 22, 2005 - Wicket Stuff was accepted by SourceForge
subsection.p: The Wicket team wishes to thank the SourceForge team for accepting Wicket Stuff as a project on the SourceForge servers.

section.p: See the news archive for more (older) news.
